lead_paragraph: Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko said allegations he had helped cover up a top footballer's positive doping test were silly and that he and Russia were being smeared as payback for winning the right to host the 2018 World Cup.

headline.print_headline: Russia Says Doping Cover-Up Stories Are Silly Revenge
headline.main: Russia Says Doping Cover-Up Stories Are Silly Revenge

snippet: Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko said allegations he had helped cover up a top footballer's positive doping test were silly and that he and Russia were being smeared as payback for winning the right to host the 2018 World Cup....
